page.title: 07Courteenhall Sir H. Wake
page.content: Sir Hereward Wake, Bart., M.C.,born 1916. Educated at Eton and The Royal Military College, Sandhurst. He served in the King's Royal Rifle Corps being awarded the Military Cross in 1942. After being wounded in North Africa he was invalided out as a Major in 1947. He then studied Estate Management & Agriculture. Sir Hereward is the 14th Baronet & Courteenhall has been the home of this family for over 300 yrs. He is at present Vice Lord Lieutenant for Northamptonshire. Apart from his work related to the Estate he actively supports many organizations & soc'ties throughout the County. He is President of the N'hamptonshire Record Society, the County Landowners Association the N'amptonshire Assoc. of Youth Clubs & The local Royal British Legion. He is Vice President of StAndrew's Hospt. & Chairman of the Lamport Hall Trust.
